001package Calibration_Demos_More;
002
003import ij.IJ;
004import ij.ImagePlus;
005import ij.ImageStack;
006import ij.io.LogStream;
007import ij.plugin.PlugIn;
008import ij.process.ImageProcessor;
009import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.CalibrationImage;
010import imagingbook.calibration.data.zhang.ZhangData;
011import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.Camera;
012import imagingbook.calibration.zhang.InterCameraMapping;
013import imagingbook.common.geometry.mappings.Mapping2D;
014import imagingbook.common.image.ImageMapper;
015import imagingbook.common.interpolation.InterpolationMethod;
016import imagingbook.common.math.PrintPrecision;
017import imagingbook.core.resource.ImageResource;
018
019
020/**
021 * This plugin opens an image stack containing the 5 Zhang
022 * test images (assumed to be taken with camera A) and re-renders 
023 * the images by mapping them to a new camera B. In this example,
024 * only the lens distortion coefficients are modified but in
025 * principle all intrinsic parameters of camera B could be changed.
026 * 
027 * @author W. Burger
028 * @version 2021-08-22
029 */
030public class Demo_Replace_Camera implements PlugIn {
031
032        private static ImageResource resource = CalibrationImage.CalibImageStack_tif;   // = "CalibImageStack.tif"
033
034        // modified lens distortion coefficients:
035        static double k1 = -0.1;
036        static double k2 =  2.0;
037
038        static boolean BeVerbose = false;
039
040        //static final String TestImgName = "CalibImageStack.tif";
041        static {
042                LogStream.redirectSystem();
043                PrintPrecision.set(6);
044        }
045
046        public void run(String arg0) {
047                // open the test image (stack): 
048                ImagePlus testIm = resource.getImage();
049
050                if (testIm == null) {
051                        IJ.error("Could not open calibration images!");
052                        return;
053                }
054                testIm.show();
055                String title = testIm.getShortTitle();
056
057                // get the camera intrinsics (typically by calibration):
058                Camera cameraA = ZhangData.getCameraIntrinsics();
059
060                double[] paramsA = cameraA.getParameterVector();
061                paramsA[5] = k1;
062                paramsA[6] = k2;
063
064                Camera cameraB = new Camera(paramsA);
065
066                // create a special geometric mapping
067                Mapping2D mapping = new InterCameraMapping(cameraA, cameraB);   // inverse, maps target to source
068
069                // rectify the images and create a new stack:
070                ImageStack distStack = testIm.getStack();
071                final int w = distStack.getWidth();
072                final int h = distStack.getHeight();
073                final int M = distStack.getSize();
074
075                ImageStack rectStack = new ImageStack(w, h);
076                for (int i = 0; i < M; i++) {
077                        IJ.showProgress(i, M);
078                        ImageProcessor source = distStack.getProcessor(i + 1);
079                        ImageProcessor target = source.createProcessor(w, h);
080                        ImageMapper mapper = new ImageMapper(mapping, null, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
081                        mapper.map(source, target);
082//                      mapping.applyTo(source, target, InterpolationMethod.Bicubic);
083                        rectStack.addSlice("frame"+ (i + 1), target);
084                }
085
086                new ImagePlus(title+"-modfied", rectStack).show();
087        }
088
089}
